data.name: Lemons Must Die
data.detailed_description:
John Lemon is grieving the loss of his love Liz Lemon as he catches a glimpse of her ghost. Chase Liz through bizarre worlds, survive attacks from twisted lemon monsters and gather fragments of your memory as you fight for every drop of juice!

Features:



  • Unfolding story through 5 animated chapters.
  • Kill monsters for their juice, before your own runs out.
  • Rogue like procedural level generation, you'll never play the same level twice!
  • Specially designed boss levels.
  • Traps and power-ups to challenge your survival.
  • 5 worlds and more than 10 monsters types, each with their unique AI and attack styles.
data.about_the_game:
John Lemon is grieving the loss of his love Liz Lemon as he catches a glimpse of her ghost. Chase Liz through bizarre worlds, survive attacks from twisted lemon monsters and gather fragments of your memory as you fight for every drop of juice!

Features:

  • Rogue like procedural level generation, you'll never play the same level twice!
  • Specially designed boss levels.
  • Traps and power-ups to challenge your survival.
  • 5 worlds and more than 10 monsters types, each with their unique AI and attack styles.
data.short_description: Get John Lemon through strange worlds and save Liz Lemon from the monstrous creatures who have taken her!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 64-bit Service Pack 1
  • Процессор: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.4 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce 440 GT or AMD Radeon 5670 HD (minimum 1GB)
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 5 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 8 64-bit or later
  • Процессор: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 5 GB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: OSX 10.9.2 or Higher
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce 440 GT or AMD Radeon 5670 HD (minimum 1GB)
  • Место на диске: 5 GB
mac_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: OSX 10.9.2 or Higher
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5 or i7 2.4GHz or faster
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Место на диске: 5 GB

linux_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Ubuntu 15.04 or later
  • Процессор: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.4 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Место на диске: 5 GB
linux_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Ubuntu 15.04 or later
  • Процессор: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Оперативная память: 16 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or higher with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Место на диске: 5 GB
